roleset.name: natural disaster: rampant spread of disease
roleset.note: OUTBREAK-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to epidemic, pandemic. (from outbreak.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: outbreak-n: arg1
example.text: An outbreak of plague was found in the Kulinsky district of the republic of Dagestan.

example.name: outbreak-n: arg4
example.text: The Great Influenza examines the 1918 pandemic, an outbreak with a death toll of 50 to 100 million.
example.arg: with a death toll of 50 to 100 million
